Block Management

Aktonz is a company that specializes in managing all aspects of a block of properties, from start to finish. Our services include overseeing service charge collections, arranging for property maintenance and repairs, dealing with service charge arrears, arranging for cleaning services, and much more.

When you use our block management services, you can rest easy knowing that we’ll handle all the details of managing your property, freeing you up to focus on other things. Our team is experienced and dedicated to maintaining the highest standards.

We understand the importance of balancing the needs of landlords and leaseholders alike, which is why our block managers take care to represent the interests of all parties. We’ll collect ground-rent and service charges, chase up late payments, and even have a dedicated team of solicitors on hand to deal with any non-paying leaseholders.

We go above and beyond to ensure that the property and its communal areas are well-maintained, and that any neighbor disputes are resolved quickly and fairly. Our team keeps accurate records of all monetary matters and provides regular reports on the property’s condition. With Aktonz, you can be sure that all aspects of your block will be taken care of.

At Aktonz, we understand that managing a block of properties can be a complex and time-consuming task. That’s why we offer comprehensive block management services to help landlords and property owners take care of their properties with ease.

Our block management services include:

  • Communicating with tenants and residents to address any issues or concerns
  • Coordinating maintenance and repairs for the common areas of the building
  • Arranging and overseeing necessary repairs, including arranging for contractors
  • Collecting and distributing service charges, ground rent, and insurance payments
  • Keeping accurate financial records and providing regular financial reports to landlords and property owners
  • Ensuring compliance with all relevant legislation, including health and safety regulations
  • Organizing and chairing meetings of the landlord or tenants association
  • Providing 24/7 emergency contact

Our team of experienced agents will work with you to create a personalized plan that suits your specific needs. We are committed to providing excellent customer service, and we are always available to answer any questions you may have.

If you’re a landlord or property owner looking for a reliable and efficient block management service, look no further than Aktonz. Contact us today to discuss how we can help you manage your properties.

Need help? Call our support team on 0203 389 8009
